SEARCH
Package Solvers

Klasse Solver

java.lang.Object
Solvers.Solver
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
Backtracker, Resolution, ResolutionReduction, Walker
public abstract class Solver extends Object
This is the superclass of all solver classes. Its static methods maintain information about all solver classes. Its instance methods proved the interface to the ProblemSupervisor. Created by ohlbach on 09.10.2018.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Solver

      public Solver(Integer solverNumber, HashMap<String,Object> solverParameters)
      constructs a solver as an instance of the Processor class.
      Parameter:
      solverNumber - to distinguish different solvers of the same type, but different parameters,
      solverParameters - the control parameters for the solver

    • Solver

      public Solver(Integer solverNumber)

    • Solver

      public Solver()

  • Methodendetails

    • isSolver

      public static boolean isSolver(String name)
      checks if the name is a solver name
      Parameter:
      name - a string
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the name is the name of a solver.

    • solverClass

      public static Class solverClass(String solverName)
      maps the solver names to the solver classes.
      This method must be extended when a new solver class is added.
      Parameter:
      solverName - a solver name
      Gibt zurück:
      the solver class, or null

    • help

      public static String help()
      collects all the help-strings for all solver classes
      Gibt zurück:
      the collected help string for all solver classes

    • help

      public static String help(String solverName)
      returns the help-string for the generator with the given name
      Parameter:
      solverName - a solver name
      Gibt zurück:
      its help-string

    • makeSolvers

      public static ArrayList<Solver> makeSolvers(ArrayList<HashMap<String,String>> parameterList, StringBuilder errors, StringBuilder warnings)
      parses the string-type parameters into sequences of objects
      Parameter:
      parameterList - the parameters
      errors - for collecting error messages
      warnings - for collecting warning messages
      Gibt zurück:
      a list of solvers

    • makeParameters

      public static ArrayList<Parameters> makeParameters()
      Constructs a list of Parameters objects by invoking the "makeParameter" method in each generator class.
      Gibt zurück:
      an ArrayList of Parameters objects

    • initialize

      public void initialize(Thread thread, ProblemSupervisor problemSupervisor)
      initializes the parameters which are common to all solvers.
      Parameter:
      thread - the solver's thread.
      problemSupervisor - the supervisor for the problem.

    • getSolverId

      public String getSolverId()

    • solveProblem

      public abstract Result solveProblem()
      The key method, which has to be implemented by the solvers.
      It is supposed to find a model or a contradiction in the clauses.
      Gibt zurück:
      Un/Satisfiable or null

    • getStatistics

      public abstract Statistic getStatistics()
      returns the solver's statistics.
      Gibt zurück:
      the statistics of the solver

    • trueInModel

      public boolean trueInModel(Clause clause, Model model)
      This method checks if some literals are true or all literals are false in a model
      Parameter:
      clause - a clause
      model - a model
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the clause is true in the model

    • checkModel

      public Result checkModel(Model model)
      The method checks if the model satisfies the basic clauses.
      Gibt zurück:
      null or an Erraneous Result
